# HyperFyre
A platform to automate the IDO whitelisting process using Hypersign SSI infrastructure.

https://fyre.hypersign.id

## System Flow

### Hypersign Auth Credential Issuance Flow

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15328561/116998945-9535d000-acfc-11eb-9ca3-df7593036121.png)

[src](https://sequencediagram.org/index.html#)
